person.persName: Orson Ames (Marion County, Kentucky, grocer and editor)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, editor. New York native. Married to Martha Ann Bell Ames in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on March 30, 1835. Father of Virginia Ames, Samuel R. Ames, Eliza F. Ames, Edward Remington Ames, Leonard E. Ames, Maria L. Ames, and Clarrissa E. Ames. Married to Elizabeth Lewis Ames in Jefferson County on December 26, 1854. Father of James O. Ames, and T. Ellena Ames. Grocer in Marion County in 1850. Editor in Marion County in 1860. Postmaster at Lebanon, Kentucky, from June 8, 1861, to April 16, 1869.
